title: Chapter 1460 - Arrival
body:
Chapter 1460 - Arrival

The setting sun cast its last remnants of light.

Su Yi stood alone amidst the rubble, completely silent.

The ruins stretched as far as the eye could see. Everywhere he looked, he saw collapsed buildings and utter desolation.

The marks of a grand battle covered the ground, with fragmented corpses scattered across the ruins. The bloodstains had already dried, and they almost seemed like splatters of ink.

This was the Shen Family estate!

Shen Mu remembered this place as a blessed ground covered with pavilions. It was glorious and resplendent, and over ten thousand of his clansmen had lived here alongside him.

This was the site of Shen Mu’s happy memories of his childhood and young adulthood. His mother’s doting, his father’s strictness, his clansmen’s caring, his seniors’ earnest guidance…

But now, all of it lay in ruin! And too many of his clansmen had died to count!

A heart-rending agony coursed through Su Yi’s entire body. These were Shen Mu’s emotions: regret and hatred.

Su Yi took out a jug of wine and sipped in silence.

He’d already fused with several of his past lives’ Dao Imprints. Shen Mu, the one who’d let a woman destroy...
